channel.title: Fishing Project! help needed
channel.description:
Well, im planning to add fishing to my server, BUT I have no idea how, so please help me setting up this crap (soz (A) )...
I have kind of coding experience, lets say 6 or 7 out of 10, im not the best there is, but i can do alot, and i learn fast. So, is anyone able to help me with this stuff? Ill do most of the work, if neccecery, but at least what i can do... And credits go to everyone who helped so,
My goal is actually to make a quite complete fishing skill, if you're not really up to making the whole thing, then don't mind signing in, I'm not really happy with people who give me two lines of code and then take off. I want a fishing skill that includes: -Info about the skill, most of that is covered already, wasn't so hard... -Most of the fishing spots working (there are like 300 spots, wherefrom 4 id's are the same spots, no need to do double work..) -Giving it XP ofcourse, a skill aint a skill without a reward.. -Maybye we'll build in a fishing cape thing, but I'm considering not to bother that.
Currently on the project: -Me :) -My brother, doesnt have a mopar account but hes helping me out.. -? -?
I guess fishing aint such a hard skill to make.. So, if you're a bit of a worker, and you maybye want to use this for your own server, you can, were working on it all together, so everyone gets to use it, so if you're willing to help out, and you might want this for your own server, help me out and sign up!
UPDATES: Ive added the 'info' file about fishing, clicking on the skill icon now gives a list of all available fish and wich levels and how to catch. ive listed: -shrimp(net) 1 -sardine(bait) 2 -herring(bait) 2 -anchovies(net) 1 -trout(fly) 3 -herring(bait) 2 -salmon(fly) 3 -tuna(harpoon) 4 -lobster(cage) 5 -swordfish(harpoon) 4
These are also the only ones i want to be fishable yet, once we have the base we can expend it or leave it that way, im not to make that discision, because i dont mind actually :)

item.title: Fishing Project! help needed
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

dude, im not saying its hard, im saying its kinda alot work. And yes i tried, and as said in the topic, im not the best coder alive, so this requires some help, now dont go piss on my project please.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 08:58:04 AM[/size][hr]Come ON people! is no one willing to help me out?

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing Project! help needed
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

Well, im planning to add fishing to my server, BUT I have no idea how, so please help me setting up this crap (soz (A) )…

I have kind of coding experience, lets say 6 or 7 out of 10, im not the best there is, but i can do alot, and i learn fast. So, is anyone able to help me with this stuff? Ill do most of the work, if neccecery, but at least what i can do… And credits go to everyone who helped so,

My goal is actually to make a quite complete fishing skill, if you’re not really up to making the whole thing, then don’t mind signing in, I’m not really happy with people who give me two lines of code and then take off.
I want a fishing skill that includes:
-Info about the skill, most of that is covered already, wasn’t so hard…
-Most of the fishing spots working (there are like 300 spots, wherefrom 4 id’s are the same spots, no need to do double work…)
-Giving it XP ofcourse, a skill aint a skill without a reward…
-Maybye we’ll build in a fishing cape thing, but I’m considering not to bother that.

Currently on the project:
-Me
-My brother, doesnt have a mopar account but hes helping me out…
-?
-?

I guess fishing aint such a hard skill to make… So, if you’re a bit of a worker, and you maybye want to use this for your own server, you can, were working on it all together, so everyone gets to use it, so if you’re willing to help out, and you might want this for your own server, help me out and sign up!

UPDATES:
Ive added the ‘info’ file about fishing, clicking on the skill icon now gives a list of all available fish and wich levels and how to catch.
ive listed:
-shrimp(net) 1
-sardine(bait) 2
-herring(bait) 2
-anchovies(net) 1
-trout(fly) 3
-herring(bait) 2
-salmon(fly) 3
-tuna(harpoon) 4
-lobster(cage) 5
-swordfish(harpoon) 4

These are also the only ones i want to be fishable yet, once we have the base we can expend it or leave it that way, im not to make that discision, because i dont mind actually
